trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden to use a derived <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" /> class instead of the base class provided with the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會覆寫使用衍生<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart" />類別改為使用 Web 組件提供基底類別的控制項集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a custom warning message displayed to end users when they delete a control.
A string that contains the text of the warning message.
trans-unit.target: 包含警告訊息的文字字串。

trans-unit.source: The default value is a localized warning message.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是當地語系化的警告訊息。

trans-unit.source: When a user deletes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, normally a default warning message is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者刪除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制時，通常會顯示預設的警告訊息。

trans-unit.source: It warns the user that when this instance of a control is deleted, the deletion is permanent.
trans-unit.target: 它會警告使用者，在刪除控制項的這個執行個體時，會永久刪除。

trans-unit.source: The page developer might provide users with a way to add a new instance of the control to the page (such as through a catalog of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, or through some programmatic means), but the current instance of a control that is deleted is permanently removed.
trans-unit.target: 網頁開發人員可能會提供一種方式，將控制項的新執行個體加入至頁面的使用者 (例如的類別目錄<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，或透過一些程式設計的方式)，但是永久移除已刪除的控制項的目前執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The dialog box that displays the warning includes a button for the user to cancel the deletion, if desired.
trans-unit.target: 如有需要，會顯示警告對話方塊中包含要取消刪除動作，使用者 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWarning%2A> property enables developers to set the warning message that is displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWarning%2A>屬性可讓開發人員若要設定顯示給使用者的警告訊息。

trans-unit.source: If a page developer assigns an empty string ("") value to this property, no warning message dialog box will be shown when a user deletes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果網頁開發人員會指派為空字串 ("") 會顯示於此屬性沒有警告訊息 對話方塊的值，當使用者刪除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWarning%2A> property is not displayed in the case of static <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls and server controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWarning%2A>屬性不會顯示在靜態<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項和伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: Static controls are server controls that are declared within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone in the markup of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 靜態控制項是伺服器控制項中已宣告<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>網頁標記中的區域。

trans-unit.source: Because such controls are static, they cannot be deleted, so the delete warning message is never displayed in that case.
trans-unit.target: 這類控制項都是靜態的因為它們無法刪除，如此一來，刪除警告訊息永遠不會顯示在此情況下。

trans-unit.source: Static controls can be closed by a user, but a closed control is added to the page catalog, from which it can be added back to the page by a user, whereas a deleted control can never be recovered.
trans-unit.target: 靜態控制項可以關閉的使用者，但已關閉的控制項加入至頁面目錄，在其中它可以加入至網頁的使用者，而永遠無法復原刪除的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWarning%2A> property declaratively and programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWarning%2A>屬性以宣告方式和程式設計的方式。

trans-unit.source: There are four parts to the code example:
trans-unit.target: 有四個部分的程式碼範例：

trans-unit.source: A user control that enables you to change page display modes.
trans-unit.target: 使用者控制項，可讓您變更頁面的顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: A custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: A Web page.
trans-unit.target: Web 網頁。

trans-unit.source: An explanation of how the example works in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example is the user control for changing display modes.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項變更顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: You can obtain the source code for the user control from the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 您可以從範例 > 一節的取得使用者控制項的原始程式碼<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: For more information about display modes and how the user control works, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).
trans-unit.target: 如需顯示模式和使用者控制項的運作方式的詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example is the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第二個部分是自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For the code example to run, you must compile this source code.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。

trans-unit.source: You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。

trans-unit.source: This example uses the dynamic compilation approach; thus there is no `Assembly` attribute in the `Register` directive for this control at the top of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用動態編譯的方法;因此沒有任何`Assembly`屬性`Register`對這個控制項頂端的網頁指示詞。

trans-unit.source: For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).
trans-unit.target: 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。

trans-unit.source: The third part of the code example is the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第三個部分是 Web 網頁。

trans-unit.source: The page contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> zone, with the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control declared in the zone, so that a user can add it to the page at run time.
trans-unit.target: 此頁面包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>區域，使用的自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項中所宣告該區域，以便讓使用者可以將它加入頁面在執行階段。

trans-unit.source: Note that only dynamic controls (controls that are added to a page programmatically or from a catalog like this one) can be deleted from a page.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，可以從頁面刪除僅動態控制項 （以程式設計方式或從這類目錄加入至網頁的控制項）。

trans-unit.source: Static controls (controls that are declared within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone in the markup of a page) can be closed, but never deleted.
trans-unit.target: 靜態控制項 (控制項中已宣告<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>區域在頁面標記中的) 可以關閉，但永遠不會刪除。

trans-unit.source: The `<asp:webpartmanager>` element declares a custom value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWarning%2A> property by using the `DeleteWarning` attribute.
trans-unit.target: `<asp:webpartmanager>`項目宣告的自訂值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWarning%2A>屬性使用`DeleteWarning`屬性。

trans-unit.source: The `Button1_Click` method assigns another custom value to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWarning%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: `Button1_Click`方法會將指派到另一個自訂值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWarning%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser, you need to add the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control to the page.
trans-unit.target: 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，您需要加入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項加入網頁。

trans-unit.source: Using the **Display Mode** drop-down list control, select catalog mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項中，選取類別目錄的模式。

trans-unit.source: When the catalog appears, select the check box next to the custom control, click **Add** to add it to the page, and then click **Close** to return the page to browse mode.
trans-unit.target: 目錄出現時，請選取自訂控制項旁的核取方塊，按一下**新增**以將它加入至頁面上，然後按一下**關閉**返回頁面，即可瀏覽模式。

trans-unit.source: Now that the control is visible, you can delete it.
trans-unit.target: 既然控制項為可見，您可以將它刪除。

trans-unit.source: Using the **Display Mode** control again, switch the page into design mode (you cannot delete controls while the page is in browse mode).
trans-unit.target: 使用**顯示模式**控制項一次，將頁面切換到設計模式 （您無法刪除控制項頁面瀏覽模式時）。

trans-unit.source: Click the verbs menu (the arrow symbol) in the header of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and select **Delete**.
trans-unit.target: 按一下標頭中的動詞命令功能表 （的箭頭符號）<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，然後選取**刪除**。

trans-unit.source: The warning that you set on the `DeleteWarning` attribute appears.
trans-unit.target: 您在設定的警告`DeleteWarning`屬性隨即顯示。

trans-unit.source: Click **Cancel**.
trans-unit.target: 按一下**取消**。

trans-unit.source: Now click the button labeled **Change Delete Warning**, which changes the property value programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 現在按一下 標示為按鈕**變更刪除警告**，以程式設計方式變更的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: From the verbs menu on the control, select **Delete** again, and notice that this time the other warning message appears.
trans-unit.target: 從控制項上的動詞命令功能表，選取**刪除**一次，並請注意，此時會出現警告訊息。

trans-unit.source: The server control to be deleted.
Permanently removes a dynamic instance of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control from a Web page.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWebPart%2A> method permanently removes the control represented by the `webPart` parameter from a page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWebPart%2A>方法永久移除所代表的控制項`webPart`頁中的參數。

trans-unit.source: Unlike a closed control, which is added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> control and can be added back to the page, a deleted control instance can never be added back to the page.
trans-unit.target: 不同於已關閉的控制項，其新增到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>控制項，並可以再加入頁面上，刪除的控制項執行個體可以永遠不會加入至網頁。

trans-unit.source: As implemented by the Web Parts control set, the ability for users to delete a dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control depends on the user and the personalization scope in which the control was added to a page.
trans-unit.target: 由 Web 組件控制項實作設定，可讓使用者刪除動態<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制取決於使用者和控制項加入至頁面已個人化範圍。

trans-unit.source: If the control is added when the page is in shared scope (by a user who has permissions), then the control cannot be deleted by individual users when the page is in user scope.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項已加入共用的範圍頁面時 （所具有的權限的使用者），然後控制項無法刪除由個別使用者頁面時使用者領域中。

trans-unit.source: Only dynamic controls can be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 只有動態控制項，才能刪除。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic controls are added to a page programmatically or by users adding controls from a catalog.
trans-unit.target: 動態控制項已加入至頁面，以程式設計方式或從目錄中加入控制項的使用者。

trans-unit.source: Static controls are added to a page declaratively in the markup or persistence format.
trans-unit.target: 靜態控制項加入至以宣告方式中的標記或持續性格式的頁面。

trans-unit.source: Because the declarative tags are permanently present in the markup, static controls can never be deleted, but they can be closed and reopened.
trans-unit.target: 因為永遠出現在標記中的宣告式標記，靜態控制項可以永遠不會刪除，但可以關閉並重新開啟。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWebPart%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWebPart%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The first time the **Add Calendar** button is clicked, the code in the event handler creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar> control, and adds it to a zone as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> object.
trans-unit.target: 第一次**新增行事曆**按一下按鈕時，程式碼在事件處理常式會建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>控制，並將它加入做為區域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>物件。

trans-unit.source: Because the control is added programmatically, it is a dynamic control, and therefore it can be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 以程式設計方式加入控制項，因為它是動態的控制項，並因此被刪除。

trans-unit.source: When a user clicks the **Delete Calendar** button, the code ensures that the control exists, and then deletes it by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWebPart%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下**刪除行事曆**按鈕時，程式碼可確保控制項確認存在，然後再刪除它，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWebPart%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Represents the display mode used for changing the layout of Web pages that contain Web Parts controls.
This field is read-only.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode> field references a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> object that is created and contained by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>欄位參考自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>建立和所包含的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Because this is a static object, you can refer to it directly through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class without needing an instance of the control.
trans-unit.target: 因為這是靜態的物件，您可以參考它直接透過<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>類別，而不需要的控制項執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When a page that contains Web Parts controls first loads, it is in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode> (browse mode) by default.
trans-unit.target: 當包含 Web 組件的頁面控制項第一次載入時，它就會處於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode>（瀏覽模式） 的預設值。

trans-unit.source: When users want to change the layout of the page by moving controls to different zones or within the current zones, they must first switch the page to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode> (design mode).
trans-unit.target: 當使用者想要變更頁面的版面配置將控制項移到不同的區域，或在目前的區域內時，他們必須先將頁面切換至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>（設計模式）。

trans-unit.source: In design mode, the user interface (UI) for the various zones appears, and users can then drag controls to change the layout.
trans-unit.target: 在設計模式中，使用者介面 (UI) 的各種不同的區域出現，而且使用者可以拖曳控制項，以變更版面配置。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to work with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode> field programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>欄位以程式設計的方式。

trans-unit.source: The code populates a drop-down list with the supported display modes for the page, which in this case are browse and design.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會填入下拉式清單的頁面上，在此情況下為 瀏覽和設計支援的顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: Notice that, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code checks whether the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，在`Page_PreRender`方法時，程式碼會檢查是否目前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayMode%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>。

trans-unit.source: If so, `Label1` will be visible, and if not, `Label1` will be hidden.
trans-unit.target: 如果是這樣，`Label1`將會顯示，如果沒有的話，`Label1`將隱藏。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser, you are in browse mode by default.
trans-unit.target: 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，您就預設的瀏覽模式。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the label on the page is hidden.
trans-unit.target: 請注意頁面上的標籤為隱藏。

trans-unit.source: Use the drop-down list control to switch the page to design mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用下拉式清單控制項，將頁面切換到設計模式。

trans-unit.source: Notice that, because of the code in the `Page_PreRender` method, the label is now visible.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，因為中的程式碼`Page_PreRender`方法，會立即顯示標籤。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control that is to be disconnected.
Removes a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or server control that is being closed or deleted from any connections it is participating in.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebPart%2A> method is called internally by the Web Parts control set when a control is either closed on a page or deleted from a page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebPart%2A>方法會在內部呼叫時控制項在頁面上關閉，或從頁面刪除設定的 Web 組件控制項。

trans-unit.source: In such a scenario, the method is called to remove the control from any connections where it is involved as a consumer or provider.
trans-unit.target: 在這類案例中，被呼叫方法來移除任何連線涉及為取用者或提供者。

trans-unit.source: If the control is removed from any connection, this method also calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> method to end any connections in which `webPart` was involved.
trans-unit.target: 如果從任何連線中移除控制項，這個方法也會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A>方法來中止所在的任何連接`webPart`牽涉到。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebPart%2A> method is called, it raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> event.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebPart%2A>呼叫方法時，便會產生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting>事件。

trans-unit.source: Normally this event can be cancelled, but in two cases it cannot be cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 通常這個事件可以取消，但在兩個情況下即無法取消。

trans-unit.source: One case occurs during requests to the page, when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ActivateConnections%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 其中一種情況發生在要求期間 頁面上，當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ActivateConnections%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: If there is a conflict among existing connections, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebPart%2A> method will be invoked to close one of the conflicting connections, and in this instance the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> event cannot be cancelled, because the conflict must be resolved.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有現有的連線，衝突<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebPart%2A>方法會被叫用以關閉其中一個衝突的連接，而且在這個執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting>事件無法取消，因為必須解決衝突。

trans-unit.source: The other case occurs when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or server control that is currently connected is either closed or deleted.
trans-unit.target: 在另一個案例，就會發生時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或伺服器控制項目前連接關閉或刪除。

trans-unit.source: In this case, because of the control is being removed from the page, its connection needs to be terminated as well, therefore by design it is not possible to cancel the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> event to interrupt the process of ending a connection.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，因為控制項正在移除頁面中，終止，因此依設計不可能取消其連線需求<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting>中斷結束連接的程序的事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> event.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnecting> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebPart%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebPart%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Using two custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, the Web page enables you to create a connection between the controls by clicking a button, while another button enables you to disconnect the controls.
trans-unit.target: 使用兩個自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，網頁可以可讓您按一下按鈕，而另一個按鈕可讓您中斷連線之控制項的控制項之間建立連線。

trans-unit.source: If you close one of the controls while the page is in browse mode and the controls are connected, an override of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebPart%2A> method disconnects the closed control, ends the connection, and displays a message.
trans-unit.target: 如果您關閉其中一個控制項在頁面的瀏覽模式的控制項已連接，覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebPart%2A>方法中斷連接已關閉的控制項，會結束連線，並顯示訊息。

trans-unit.source: The code example has four parts:
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例包含四個部分：

trans-unit.source: A user control for changing display modes.
trans-unit.target: 變更顯示模式的使用者控制項。

trans-unit.source: A source file containing custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 包含自訂的原始程式檔<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: A Web page to host the controls.
trans-unit.target: 裝載控制項的網頁。

trans-unit.source: An explanation of how the example works in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example is the user control for changing display modes.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項變更顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: You can obtain the source code for the user control from the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 您可以從範例 > 一節的取得使用者控制項的原始程式碼<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: For more information about display modes and how the user control works, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).
trans-unit.target: 如需顯示模式和使用者控制項的運作方式的詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。

trans-unit.source: The second part is the file containing the source code for the two custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls that will be connected, and a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 第二個部分是包含兩個自訂的原始程式碼檔<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項所要連接和自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For the code example to run, you must compile this source code.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。

trans-unit.source: You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。

trans-unit.source: This example uses dynamic compilation, so the `Register` directive that references these components in the Web page is declared accordingly at the top of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用動態編譯，所以`Register`據以宣告指示詞參考這些元件在網頁中的網頁的頂端。

trans-unit.source: For a walkthrough that demonstrates compiling options, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).
trans-unit.target: 如需示範編譯選項的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。

trans-unit.source: In the source code, notice the inherited control `MyWebPartManager` that overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebPart%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在原始程式碼中，請注意繼承的控制項`MyWebPartManager`會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebPart%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This method checks each connection in a page to see whether the control being closed participates in the connection and, if so, calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> method to end the connection.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會檢查在頁面中，查看是否正在關閉控制參與連接而且，如果是的話，會呼叫每個連接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A>方法來結束連接。

trans-unit.source: This is identical to the base implementation of the method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 這等同於在方法的基底實作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The overridden method then customizes the base implementation by writing a message to the page.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫的方法然後自訂基底實作，透過將訊息寫入頁面。

trans-unit.source: The third part of the code example is the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第三個部分是 Web 網頁。

trans-unit.source: Notice that near the top, it contains `Register` directives to register the user control, and the dynamically compiled assembly with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，最上方，它包含`Register`註冊的使用者控制項，並具有動態編譯的組件的指示詞<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The page has two primary methods.
trans-unit.target: 頁面具有兩種主要方法。

trans-unit.source: The `Button1_Click` method creates a connection between the controls, while the `Button2_Click` method disconnects the controls.
trans-unit.target: `Button1_Click`方法建立控制項之間的連接時`Button2_Click`方法中斷連接控制項。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page, click the **Connect** button to connect the controls.
trans-unit.target: 將頁面載入之後，請按一下**連接**連接控制項的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Then click the verbs menu in one of the controls (the downward arrow in the header of the control), and select **Close** from the verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: 然後按一下動詞命令功能表中的控制項 （控制項的標頭中的向下箭頭），並選取**關閉**從動詞命令功能表。

trans-unit.source: When you try to close the control, the overridden method is called, the connection is ended, and the message is written to the page.
trans-unit.target: 當您嘗試關閉控制項時，覆寫的方法會呼叫、 連線就會結束，並將訊息寫入至頁面。

trans-unit.source: If you want to reset the page to restore the closed control and experiment with other options, click the **Reset User State** link to remove personalization data and restore the page's original state.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要重設頁面，即可還原已關閉的控制項並嘗試使用其他選項，請按一下**重設使用者狀態**移除個人化資料和還原頁面的原始狀態的連結。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> that represents the connection between server controls.
Carries out the process of disconnecting server controls that are connected on a Web page.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> method carries out the complete process of ending a connection between <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or server controls, when you pass it the `connection` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A>方法會執行完整的程序的結束之間的連線<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或伺服器控制項，當您將傳遞`connection`參數。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to disconnect controls when you place an `<asp:connectionszone>` element in a Web page, to provide a user interface (UI) for managing connections.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來中斷連接控制項，當您將`<asp:connectionszone>`網頁上，以管理連線時，提供使用者介面 (UI) 中的項目。

trans-unit.source: When a page is in connect display mode (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode>), and a current connection exists, users can click a button that calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> method to end the connection.
trans-unit.target: 當頁面處於連接的顯示模式 (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode>)，且目前的連線存在，使用者可以按一下按鈕，以呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A>方法來結束連接。

trans-unit.source: You can also call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> method directly from your code, if you want to disconnect controls programmatically and without having to add an `<asp:connectionszone>` element to a page.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A>方法，直接從程式碼，如果您想要中斷連接控制項，以程式設計的方式，而不需要新增`<asp:connectionszone>`至頁面的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Using two custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, the Web page enables you to create a connection between the controls by clicking a button, while another button enables you to disconnect the controls.
trans-unit.target: 使用兩個自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，網頁可以可讓您按一下按鈕，而另一個按鈕可讓您中斷連線之控制項的控制項之間建立連線。

trans-unit.source: The code example has four parts:
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例包含四個部分：

trans-unit.source: A user control for changing display modes.
trans-unit.target: 變更顯示模式的使用者控制項。

trans-unit.source: A source file containing custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 包含自訂的原始程式檔<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.target: 裝載控制項的網頁。

trans-unit.target: 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。

trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項變更顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about display modes and how the user control works, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).

trans-unit.source: The second part is a file containing the source code for the two custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls that will be connected.
trans-unit.target: 第二個部分是包含兩個自訂的原始程式碼檔<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>將連接的控制項。

trans-unit.source: For the code example to run, you must compile this source code.

trans-unit.source: The third part of the code example is the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第三個部分是 Web 網頁。

trans-unit.source: Notice that near the top, it contains `Register` directives to register the user control and the dynamically compiled assembly with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，最上方，它包含`Register`登錄使用者控制項，並具有動態編譯的組件的指示詞<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The page has two primary methods.
trans-unit.target: 頁面具有兩種主要方法。

trans-unit.source: The `Button1_Click` method creates a connection between the controls, and the `Button2_Click` method disconnects the controls.
trans-unit.target: `Button1_Click`方法建立控制項之間的連接和`Button2_Click`方法中斷連接控制項。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page, you can click the **Connect** button to connect the controls.
trans-unit.target: 將頁面載入之後，您可以按一下**連接**連接控制項的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: If you enter some text in the text box control, and then click the **Enter** button, the text will be displayed in the connected control (it would not be displayed if the controls were disconnected).
trans-unit.target: 如果您輸入一些文字的文字方塊控制項中，然後再按一下**Enter**按鈕時，文字會顯示在連接的控制項 （它可能不會顯示如果控制項已中斷連線）。

trans-unit.source: If you click the **Disconnect** button, the controls will be disconnected.
trans-unit.target: 如果您按一下**中斷連線** 按鈕，控制項將會中斷連接。

trans-unit.source: You can verify the connection status of the controls by using the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page into **Connect** mode.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用，以驗證控制項的連接狀態**顯示模式**切換到頁面的下拉式清單控制項**連接**模式。

trans-unit.source: After doing that, click the verbs menu (represented by an arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and select the **Connect** item.
trans-unit.target: 之後，請按一下 （由箭號表示） 的動詞命令功能表控制項，其中的標題列中，選取**連接**項目。

trans-unit.source: The connection UI is displayed; it is available because there is an `<asp:connectionszone>` element declared in the page.
trans-unit.target: 顯示連接 UI;它是可用的因為沒有`<asp:connectionszone>`頁面中宣告的項目。

trans-unit.source: You can also connect and disconnect the controls from this UI.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以連接，並中斷此 UI 控制項。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="connection" /> is <see langword="null" />.

<paramref name="connection" /> is not contained in either <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections" /> or <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DynamicConnections" />.
<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections" /> is read-only.
\- or -
<paramref name="connection" /> has already been disconnected from <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.StaticConnections" />.
\- or -
<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DynamicConnections" /> is read-only.
\- or -
<paramref name="connection" /> has already been disconnected from <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DynamicConnections" />.

You can override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts(System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection)" /> method if you want to change the default implementation for disconnecting <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts(System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection)" />方法，如果您想要變更中斷連線的預設實作<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />控制項。

trans-unit.source: If you do override the method, and you simply want to add some implementation to the existing method, you can call the base method prior to executing your own code.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不要覆寫方法中，您只想要將某些實作加入至現有的方法，您可以呼叫基底方法，在執行自己的程式碼之前。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the active display mode for a Web page that contains Web Parts controls.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode" /> that determines a page's display mode.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode" /> ，決定頁面的顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: A page that contains Web Parts controls is always in one of several possible display modes.
trans-unit.target: 包含 Web 組件控制項的頁面一律是其中幾個可能的顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: For details about display modes, see [Web Parts Page Display Modes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc106284-82dc-4770-98cb-673dbc4ed4c4).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關顯示模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[Web 組件頁面顯示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc106284-82dc-4770-98cb-673dbc4ed4c4)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class creates the display modes for a Web page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>類別會建立網頁的顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: Using the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control creates several standard display mode objects that can be used on pages that contain Web Parts controls.
trans-unit.target: 使用基底<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>類別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項建立可以用在包含 Web 組件控制項的頁面的數個標準顯示模式物件。

trans-unit.source: These standard display modes are described in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 這些標準顯示模式中有描述<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control also manages the display modes for pages that use Web Parts controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項也會管理使用 Web 組件控制項之網頁的顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayMode%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control keeps a reference to the current display mode on a page.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayMode%2A>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項在頁面上保留目前的顯示模式的參考。

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayMode%2A> property to switch a page into different display modes.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayMode%2A>屬性，以將頁面切換至不同的顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: For an example of changing display modes on a page that uses Web Parts controls, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).
trans-unit.target: 如需在使用 Web 組件控制項的網頁變更顯示模式的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。

trans-unit.source: As part of managing the display mode, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control also provides events and event handlers relating to display modes, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnDisplayModeChanged%2A> method and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnDisplayModeChanging%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 管理顯示模式，一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項也會提供事件和顯示模式，例如相關的事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnDisplayModeChanged%2A>方法和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnDisplayModeChanging%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: These methods provide a mechanism for customizing a page's behavior, and even for adding a custom display mode.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法會提供一個機制，自訂網頁的行為，以及加入自訂的顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayMode%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: After loading the page in a browser, you can use the buttons near the bottom of the page to switch display modes.
trans-unit.target: 之後載入網頁瀏覽器中的，您可以使用靠近頁面底部的按鈕，切換顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: The page is in browse mode by default when it loads.
trans-unit.target: 頁面位於瀏覽模式，根據預設，在載入時。

trans-unit.source: If you switch to design mode, you can drag the server controls from one zone to another, or arrange two controls within one zone.
trans-unit.target: 如果您切換到設計模式，您可以將伺服器控制項從一個區域拖曳到另一個，或排列一個區域內的兩個控制項。

trans-unit.source: If you switch to edit mode, you can click the verbs menu in the header of either of the server controls, select **Edit**, and edit the control using the provided editing user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: 如果您切換至編輯模式，您可以按一下其中一種伺服器控制項，選取的標頭中的動詞命令功能表**編輯**，並編輯使用提供編輯使用者介面 (UI) 控制項。

trans-unit.source: Switching among display modes in a Web Parts application is very common, and you might want to provide a consistent, reusable way to do this on all your pages that contain Web Parts controls.
trans-unit.target: 在 Web 組件的應用程式的顯示模式間切換是很常見，因此，您可以提供一致、 可重複使用的方式，若要這樣做的所有網頁包含 Web 組件控制項。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a user control that changes display modes and that can be reused on many pages, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).
trans-unit.target: 變更顯示模式，使用者控制項的範例可以在許多頁面上重複使用，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode" /> object being assigned to the property is <see langword="null" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode" /> object being assigned to the property is not one of the supported display modes.
\- or -
The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode" /> object being assigned to the property is disabled.
Occurs after the current display mode on a Web Parts page has changed.
Display modes are an integral part of Web Parts applications.
trans-unit.target: 顯示模式是 Web 組件的應用程式中不可或缺的一部分。

trans-unit.source: When users switch to a different display mode on a Web page, the page will often take on a very different appearance, depending on the purpose of the new display mode.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者切換至不同的顯示模式，在網頁上時，網頁通常會非常不同的外觀，根據新的顯示模式的用途。

trans-unit.source: After a display mode has changed, you might want to make certain changes in the user interface (UI), such as hiding or showing certain controls, changing the appearance of selected UI elements, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 顯示模式已變更之後，您可能想要讓特定變更在使用者介面 (UI)，例如隱藏或顯示特定控制項，變更所選取的 UI 元素的外觀，並以此類推。

trans-unit.source: For more information on display modes, see [Web Parts Page Display Modes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc106284-82dc-4770-98cb-673dbc4ed4c4).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關顯示模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[Web 組件頁面顯示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc106284-82dc-4770-98cb-673dbc4ed4c4)。

trans-unit.source: For more information on consuming events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何使用事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 使用 Web Form 應用程式中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a user clicks a verb on a Web page that begins the process of changing to a different display mode.
Display modes are an integral part of Web Parts applications.
trans-unit.target: 顯示模式是 Web 組件的應用程式中不可或缺的一部分。

trans-unit.source: When users switch to a different display mode on a Web page, the page will often take on a very different appearance, depending on the purpose of the new display mode.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者切換至不同的顯示模式，在網頁上時，網頁通常會非常不同的外觀，根據新的顯示模式的用途。

trans-unit.source: After a user initiates the process of changing to a new display mode by clicking a verb, you might want to make certain changes in the user interface (UI) by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCancelEventArgs.NewDisplayMode%2A> property to determine what the new display mode will be, and then changing various UI elements accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 使用者起始的動詞命令，即可變更至新的顯示模式程序之後，您可能想要變更某些使用者介面 (UI) 中使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCancelEventArgs.NewDisplayMode%2A>屬性來判斷新的顯示模式是什麼，，然後變更 各種 UI項目據此。

trans-unit.source: A useful way to do this is to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnDisplayModeChanging%2A> method to customize the UI.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做的實用方式是覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnDisplayModeChanging%2A>自訂 UI 的方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information on display modes, see [Web Parts Page Display Modes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc106284-82dc-4770-98cb-673dbc4ed4c4).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關顯示模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[Web 組件頁面顯示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc106284-82dc-4770-98cb-673dbc4ed4c4)。

trans-unit.source: For more information on consuming events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何使用事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 使用 Web Form 應用程式中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of all display modes that are associated with a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control.

A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection" /> that contains the set of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode" /> objects associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeCollection" /> ，其中包含一組<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode" />物件相關聯<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModes%2A> property references all associated display modes, in contrast with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SupportedDisplayModes%2A> property, which references only the display modes that are available (supported) on the current page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModes%2A>屬性參考所有相關聯的顯示模式中，相較於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SupportedDisplayModes%2A>屬性，即在參考只會使用 （支援） 目前頁面上的顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: Two of the provided display modes, browse and design, are always supported on a page.
trans-unit.target: 兩個提供的顯示模式中，瀏覽與設計中，一律支援在頁面上。

trans-unit.source: The other three display modes, edit, catalog, and connections, are supported only when a page has the corresponding type of zone necessary for a particular display mode to work.
trans-unit.target: 頁面具有區域所需的特定顯示模式運作的對應型別時，才會支援其他三種顯示模式、 編輯、 目錄及連線。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you page does not contain an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> zone, the edit display mode would appear in the collection referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModes%2A> property, but would not appear in the collection referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SupportedDisplayModes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您的頁面不包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>區域，編輯顯示模式將會出現在所參考的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModes%2A>屬性，但不是會出現在所參考的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SupportedDisplayModes%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the programmatic use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式使用的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModes%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The code uses this property to populate the list with all the display modes available in the Web Parts control set, even those that are not supported on the current page.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會使用這個屬性來填入清單所有可用的顯示模式 Web 組件控制項集合中，甚至不支援目前的頁面上。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the catalog and connect display modes are not supported, because their corresponding required zones are not on the page.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，類別目錄，而且連線的顯示不支援的模式，因為對應的必要區域不在頁面上。

trans-unit.source: The other three display modes--browse, design, and edit--are supported on the page.
trans-unit.target: 其他三個顯示模式： 支援在頁面上瀏覽、 設計和編輯。

trans-unit.source: Edit mode is supported because the page contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> zone, while browse and design modes are always supported.
trans-unit.target: 編輯支援模式，因為此頁面包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>區域，瀏覽時，一律會支援設計模式。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser, you can use the drop-down list control to switch the page from browse mode to design mode, and then to edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，您可以使用下拉式清單控制項切換到設計模式，將頁面從瀏覽模式，然後編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: In edit mode, you can click the drop-down verbs menu in the header of one of the server controls, and select **Edit** to edit the control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以在編輯模式中，按一下下拉式清單動詞命令功能表中的伺服器控制項的其中一個標頭，並選取**編輯**，編輯控制項。

trans-unit.source: Note that if you select **Catalog** or **Connect** in the drop-down list, an error page is generated.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，如果您選取**目錄**或**連接**在下拉式清單中，會產生錯誤頁面。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of all dynamic connections that currently exist on a Web page.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection" /> that contains references to all dynamic connections on a page.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionCollection" /> ，其中包含所有頁面上的動態連接的參考。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic connections are connections that are created programmatically, as opposed to statically.
trans-unit.target: 動態的連接都是以程式設計的方式，而非以靜態方式建立的連接。

trans-unit.source: Static connections are created by declaring them in the markup of a Web Forms page.
trans-unit.target: 藉由在 Web Form 網頁標記中宣告它們可以建立靜態連接。

trans-unit.source: Dynamic connections are formed either programmatically, or by a user creating a connection using the connection user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: 以程式設計的方式，或由使用者建立連接，使用連接的使用者介面 (UI) 的格式動態連接。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DynamicConnections%2A> collection, though it is read-only and you cannot change its contents, does provide programmatic access to each dynamic connection object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DynamicConnections%2A>集合中，雖然它是唯讀的您無法變更其內容，但是提供以程式設計方式存取每個動態連接物件。

trans-unit.source: To perform common operations such as connecting or disconnecting <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, developers should use the public methods on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A>, rather than trying to directly modify connection objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DynamicConnections%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行一般作業，例如連線或中斷連線<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項開發人員應該使用的公用方法上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>類別，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisconnectWebParts%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectWebParts%2A>，而不需要嘗試直接修改連線中的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DynamicConnections%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Represents the display mode in which end users can edit and modify server controls.
This field is read-only.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode> field references a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> object that is created and contained by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>欄位參考自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>建立和所包含的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Because this is a static object, you can refer to it directly through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class without needing an instance of the control.
trans-unit.target: 因為這是靜態的物件，您可以參考它直接透過<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>類別，而不需要的控制項執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When a page that contains Web Parts controls first loads, it is in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode> (browse mode) by default.
trans-unit.target: 當包含 Web 組件的頁面控制項第一次載入時，它就會處於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode>（瀏覽模式） 的預設值。

trans-unit.source: When users want to edit or modify a server control, they must first switch the page to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode> (edit mode).
trans-unit.target: 當使用者想要編輯或修改伺服器控制項時，他們必須先將頁面切換至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>（編輯模式）。

trans-unit.source: Second, they must select a specific server control to edit, by clicking the edit verb on the verbs menu in that control's header.
trans-unit.target: 第二，他們都必須選取特定的伺服器控制項，以編輯，請按一下該控制項的標頭中的動詞命令功能表上的編輯動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: After the control is in edit mode, the editing user interface (UI) appears for editing the selected control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項處於編輯模式之後，編輯的使用者介面 (UI) 會出現編輯選取的控制項。

trans-unit.source: To enable edit mode on a page, the page must contain at least one <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone> zone that includes one or more of the provided editing controls, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart> control, or custom editing controls.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用編輯模式，在頁面上的，頁面必須至少包含一個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZone>區域，其中包含一或多個提供編輯控制項，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.LayoutEditorPart>控制項或自訂的編輯控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to work with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode> field programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>欄位以程式設計的方式。

trans-unit.source: The code populates a drop-down list with the supported display modes for the page, which in this case are browse, design, and edit.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會填入下拉式清單的頁面上，在此情況下會瀏覽、 設計和編輯支援的顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: To support editing, an `<asp:EditorZone>` element is in the page.
trans-unit.target: 若要支援編輯，`<asp:EditorZone>`項目是在的頁面。

trans-unit.source: Notice that, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code checks whether the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayMode%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，在`Page_PreRender`方法時，程式碼會檢查是否目前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayMode%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>。

trans-unit.source: If so, `Label1` will be visible, and if not, `Label1` will be hidden.
trans-unit.target: 如果是這樣，`Label1`將會顯示，如果沒有的話，`Label1`將隱藏。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser, you are in browse mode by default.
trans-unit.target: 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，您就預設的瀏覽模式。

trans-unit.source: Notice the label on the page is hidden.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，隱藏的頁面上的標籤。

trans-unit.source: Use the drop-down list control to switch the page to edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 若要將頁面切換至編輯模式，使用下拉式清單控制項。

trans-unit.source: Notice that, because of the code in the `Page_PreRender` method, the label is now visible.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，因為中的程式碼`Page_PreRender`方法，會立即顯示標籤。

trans-unit.source: Click the **Edit** verb in the verbs menu on one of the controls, to enable editing of that specific control.
trans-unit.target: 按一下**編輯**在其中一個控制項，以啟用該特定控制項的編輯動詞命令功能表中的動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether client-side scripting is enabled on the Web page that contains a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control.
A Boolean value that indicates whether client script can run on the page.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出是否在頁面上，可以執行用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EnableClientScript%2A> property provides a way for developers to disable client scripts.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EnableClientScript%2A>屬性可讓開發人員若要停用用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: You might want to disable client scripting for security purposes, or to ensure that all users of a page will have a similar user experience, even if they use different browsers.
trans-unit.target: 您可能想要停用用戶端指令碼，基於安全性目的，或確保所有頁面的使用者會都有類似的使用者經驗，即使它們使用不同的瀏覽器。

trans-unit.source: You can disable client scripting by adding an `EnableClientScript` attribute to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> element on a Web page, as in the following line of declarative code:
trans-unit.target: 您可以停用用戶端指令碼加入`EnableClientScript`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>元素在網頁上，如下列宣告式的程式碼行所示：

trans-unit.source: Also, developers could eliminate this property by inheriting from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class and setting the default value to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 此外，開發人員能夠排除這個屬性透過繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>類別及設定預設值給`false`。

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set uses client scripting to provide some of the client user interface (UI) and personalization features.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件控制項集合會使用用戶端指令碼來提供一些用戶端使用者介面 (UI) 和個人化功能。

trans-unit.source: If you disable client scripting, Web Parts controls still work, but some features are disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果您停用用戶端指令碼、 Web 組件控制項還能運作，但會停用某些功能。

trans-unit.source: The ability to drag controls into different zones is disabled, along with the ability to render verbs in a drop-down verbs menu in a control's title bar (the verbs are instead displayed as links in the control's title bar).
trans-unit.target: 將控制項拖曳到不同區域的能力已停用，以及呈現下拉式動詞命令功能表中控制項的標題列 （動詞命令會顯示為控制項的標題列中的連結） 中的動詞命令的能力。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating that the use of themes is enabled on a Web page.
A Boolean value that indicates whether themes are enabled.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出是否啟用佈景主題。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 所有情況下都是 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A> property to ensure that it always returns a value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> Control 覆寫基底<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableTheming%2A>屬性，以確保一律會傳回值的`true`。

trans-unit.source: This is done because the Web Parts control set requires the use of themes to render the Web Parts controls that are child controls of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control and that form the user interface (UI) of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為 Web 組件控制項集合需要呈現 Web 組件的佈景主題的使用控制項的子控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控制項，形成網頁的使用者介面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: For example, themes are used to render the various zones, and the controls that reside in the zones, including the various types of part controls (controls that inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part> class), user controls, ASP.NET server controls, and custom server controls.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，佈景主題以用來呈現不同的區域，和位於區域，其中包括各種類型的控制項組件的控制項 (繼承自控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part>類別)，使用者控制項、 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項和自訂的伺服器控制項。

trans-unit.source: Although the overridden <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EnableTheming%2A> property is implemented as a read/write property in accordance with its base property, you cannot set the property, because by design it must always return a value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: 雖然覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EnableTheming%2A>屬性會實作為其基底屬性根據讀/寫屬性，您無法設定屬性，因為根據設計一律會傳回值為`true`。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to set the property, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試設定屬性，<xref:System.NotSupportedException>擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the property value.
Completes the process of connecting a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control to another control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EndWebPartConnecting%2A> method finishes the process of connecting a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control to another control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EndWebPartConnecting%2A>方法完成連接的程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>為其他控制項的控制項。

trans-unit.source: It is the counterpart to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartConnecting%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 它是對應項目來<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartConnecting%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EndWebPartConnecting%2A> method ensures that the personalization object referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A> property is modifiable, which is necessary because forming a connection is itself a type of personalization.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EndWebPartConnecting%2A>方法可確保所參考的個人化物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A>屬性是可修改，而這是必要的因為建立連接是本身的個人化的類型。

trans-unit.source: The method then ensures that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart%2A> object is not `null`, and finally calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnSelectedWebPartChanged%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 方法接著確定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart%2A>物件不是`null`，最後會呼叫和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnSelectedWebPartChanged%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The control referenced by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
Developers who need to extend the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control might want to override this method in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 開發人員需要擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />控制項可能會想要覆寫這個方法在衍生類別中的。

trans-unit.source: One approach would be to call the base method and then add some additional custom handling, or you might want to completely customize the entire process of completing a connection between controls.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個方法會呼叫基底方法，然後加入一些其他的自訂處理，或您可能想要完全自訂的整個程序完成控制項之間的連接。

trans-unit.source: Completes the process of editing a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EndWebPartEditing%2A> method finishes the process of editing a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EndWebPartEditing%2A>方法完成編輯程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: It is the counterpart to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartEditing%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 它是對應項目來<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartEditing%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EndWebPartEditing%2A> method ensures that the personalization object referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A> property is modifiable, which is necessary because editing a control is a process that requires personalization changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EndWebPartEditing%2A>方法可確保所參考的個人化物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Personalization%2A>屬性是可修改，而這是必要的因為編輯控制項是需要個人化變更的程序。

trans-unit.source: The method then ensures that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart%2A> object is not `null`, so that the currently selected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control can change, and finally it calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnSelectedWebPartChanged%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 方法接著確定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart%2A>物件不是`null`，以便在目前選取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項可能會變更，而且它會呼叫最後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnSelectedWebPartChanged%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The control referenced by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
Developers who need to extend the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control might want to override this method in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 開發人員需要擴充<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />控制項可能會想要覆寫這個方法在衍生類別中的。

trans-unit.source: One approach would be to call the base method and then add some additional custom handling, or you might want to completely customize the entire process of completing the editing of a control.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個方法會呼叫基底方法，然後加入一些其他的自訂處理，或您可能想要完全自訂完成編輯控制項的整個程序。

trans-unit.source: For example, in the override method, you could call the base method first, and then add some code that determines what editing changes were made, and displays the list of changes back to the end user as a confirmation.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，在覆寫方法中，您無法先呼叫基底方法，並將決定所做的編輯變更一些程式碼，並顯示給終端使用者是確認回變更的清單。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of a warning message that is displayed when a user attempts to export sensitive state data from a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
A string that contains the warning message.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含警告訊息。

trans-unit.source: The default message is a culture-specific value supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 預設的訊息是由.NET Framework 所提供的特定文化特性值。

trans-unit.source: When a user attempts to export sensitive state data from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, if any of the data being exported comes from a member that was marked as sensitive in the source code, a warning message is displayed to the user in a message box, telling them that sensitive data is being exported and providing an opportunity to cancel the export.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者嘗試將敏感的狀態資料從匯出<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制，如果任何要匯出的資料來自已標示為機密的原始程式碼中的成員，告訴他們在訊息方塊中，使用者顯示警告訊息正在匯出敏感性資料，並提供取消匯出的機會。

trans-unit.source: Developers can mark a specific member's data as sensitive by setting the `isSensitive` parameter of the `[Personalizable]` attribute to `true` on the member.
trans-unit.target: 開發人員可以藉由設定項目將標示為機密的特定成員的資料`isSensitive`參數`[Personalizable]`屬性`true`成員上。

trans-unit.source: For more information about this attribute and parameter, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關這個屬性和參數的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizableAttribute>類別。

trans-unit.source: When you use the export feature of Web Parts, sensitive data could potentially be exported to unauthorized users.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用 Web 組件的匯出功能時，未經授權的使用者可以可能匯出敏感性資料。

trans-unit.source: For details on how to protect against this threat, see [Securing Web Parts Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ada6210-ed00-4157-b3e9-a7e87e77caa2).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何防範這項威脅的詳細資訊，請參閱[保護 Web 組件頁面](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ada6210-ed00-4157-b3e9-a7e87e77caa2)。

trans-unit.source: The default message is displayed whenever users attempt to export.
trans-unit.target: 每當使用者嘗試匯出時，會顯示預設訊息。

trans-unit.source: However, by assigning a value to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ExportSensitiveDataWarning%2A> property, you can provide a custom warning message.
trans-unit.target: 不過，透過指派值給<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ExportSensitiveDataWarning%2A>屬性，您可以提供自訂的警告訊息。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ExportSensitiveDataWarning%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告式使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ExportSensitiveDataWarning%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The code for the following Web page uses a standard <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList> control and places it in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 在下列網頁的程式碼會使用標準<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList>控制，並將它放在區域中。

trans-unit.source: The control will be wrapped with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control at run time, which enables it to act as a true <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項將會包裝與<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>控制項在執行階段，可讓它成為 true<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: To make the control exportable, an `ExportMode` attribute is added to the `<asp:bulletedlist>` element, and the attribute value is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode.All>, which means that both sensitive and non-sensitive data can be exported.
trans-unit.target: 將控制項設為可匯出、`ExportMode`屬性加入至`<asp:bulletedlist>`項目和屬性值設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode.All>，可以匯出敏感性及非機密資料的表示。

trans-unit.source: Note also that in the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element, the `ExportSensitiveDataWarning` attribute is assigned a custom value.
trans-unit.target: 也請注意，在`<asp:webpartmanager>`項目，`ExportSensitiveDataWarning`屬性被指派自訂的值。

trans-unit.source: Note that for the code example to work, there is a setting you must add in the Web.config file to enable exporting Web Parts description files.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，工作的程式碼範例，您必須在 Web.config 檔案，以啟用匯出 Web 組件描述檔中加入的設定。

trans-unit.source: Ensure that you have a Web.config file in the same directory as the Web page for this code example.
trans-unit.target: 確定您具有網頁上的相同目錄中的 Web.config 檔案，此程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: Within the `<system.web>` section, make sure there is a `<webParts>` element with an `enableExport` attribute set to `true`, as in the following markup.
trans-unit.target: 內`<system.web>`區段中，請確定沒有`<webParts>`具有項目`enableExport`屬性設為`true`，在下列標記中。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser, click the verbs menu (represented by a downward arrow) in the title bar of the control that contains the links.
trans-unit.target: 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，請包含連結控制項的標題列中按一下 （以向下箭號表示） 的動詞命令功能表。

trans-unit.source: In the verbs menu, select **Export**, and notice that a message box appears with the custom warning.
trans-unit.target: 在 [動作] 功能表中，選取**匯出**，並請注意，訊息方塊隨即出現，並自訂警告。

trans-unit.source: If you want to continue with the export, click **OK**, which will allow you to save a local copy of an XML description file with all the data about the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要繼續匯出，請按一下**確定**，這樣能讓您儲存的 XML 描述檔案的本機副本與控制項相關的所有資料。

trans-unit.source: The control from which data will be exported.
An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> that writes the exported data from <c>webPart</c> to an XML description file.
Creates an XML description file that contains state and property data for a server control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ExportWebPart%2A> method assembles various state and property data from `webPart` into an XML file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ExportWebPart%2A>方法組合的各種狀態及屬性資料是從`webPart`成 XML 檔案。

trans-unit.source: The data includes information about the control itself, including its assembly, state data, and property data.
trans-unit.target: 資料包括控制項本身，包括其組件、 狀態資料和屬性資料的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: The user who initiates the export can save the XML file to disk on the local computer or the network.
trans-unit.target: 起始匯出的使用者可以將 XML 檔案儲存至磁碟，本機電腦或網路上。

trans-unit.source: Other users can then import the description file to a different page or Web site, and apply the state and property data to a different instance of `webPart`.
trans-unit.target: 其他使用者可以描述檔案匯入到不同的網頁或網站，並套用至不同的執行個體的狀態和屬性資料`webPart`。

trans-unit.source: This provides a fast and convenient mechanism for users to share and reuse their settings on server controls, and it also provides developers with a means to control the appearance and behavior of exported and imported controls.
trans-unit.target: 這提供快速且方便的機制，來共用及重複使用的伺服器控制項，其設定的使用者，它也提供方法來控制的外觀和行為的匯出和匯入控制項開發人員。

trans-unit.source: Properties on `webPart` are not exported by default.
trans-unit.target: 屬性上的`webPart`預設不會匯出。

trans-unit.source: To enable export of a property, you must mark it with the `[Personalizable]` attribute in the source code.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用匯出的屬性，您必須將它與標記`[Personalizable]`的原始程式碼中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can also optionally mark an exportable property as containing sensitive data, by setting the `isSensitive` parameter of the `[Personalizable]` attribute to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以選擇性地將標示成可匯出的屬性，為包含機密資料，藉由設定`isSensitive`參數`[Personalizable]`屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: By default, `isSensitive` is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，`isSensitive`是`false`。

trans-unit.source: Developers can set the parameter to `true` to indicate that the data is sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 開發人員可以將參數設定為`true`表示資料是敏感性資訊。

trans-unit.source: To enable `webPart` to be exported, a developer sets its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A> property value to either <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode.All> (which includes all personalizable and sensitive properties), or to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode.NonSensitiveData>, which exports everything except for sensitive properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用`webPart`開發人員設定要匯出其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A>屬性值設為 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode.All> （包括所有可個人化和機密屬性），或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode.NonSensitiveData>，匯出機密屬性以外的所有內容.

trans-unit.source: Allowing users to export data from controls, and to import data into other controls, entails some security risks.
trans-unit.target: 允許使用者將資料從控制項，匯出和匯入資料到其他控制項，需要一些安全性風險。

trans-unit.source: Developers should use the approach discussed above to protect sensitive data, and if they want to avoid the risk of exposing data altogether, they should not enable export on `webPart` at all.
trans-unit.target: 開發人員應使用來保護機密資料，上面所討論的方法，而且如果他們想要避免完全公開資料的風險，則不應啟用匯出上`webPart`完全。

trans-unit.source: For details on Web Parts security issues, see [Securing Web Parts Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ada6210-ed00-4157-b3e9-a7e87e77caa2).
trans-unit.target: 如需 Web 組件的安全性問題的詳細資訊，請參閱[保護 Web 組件頁面](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ada6210-ed00-4157-b3e9-a7e87e77caa2)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="webPart" /> is <see langword="null" />.
\- or -
<paramref name="writer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="webPart" /> is not contained in the collection of controls referenced in <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Controls" />.
\- or -

The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode" /> property of <paramref name="webPart" /> is set to a value of <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode.None" />, which means that export is disabled for <paramref name="webPart" />.
Overridden to prevent focus from ever being set on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control, because it has no user interface (UI).

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Focus%2A> method overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Focus%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, and throws an exception if a caller calls the method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Focus%2A>方法會覆寫基底<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Focus%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，並擲回例外狀況，如果呼叫端呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control has no UI and is never visible to users, it can never allow focus to be set on itself.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>、 控制項沒有 ui 而且永遠不會對使用者顯示其永遠不會讓焦點設在本身。

trans-unit.source: A caller tries to call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.Focus" /> method, which is not supported in a control that has no UI.
A server control that is acting as a consumer in a connection.

Retrieves the collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint" /> objects that can act as connection points from a server control that is acting as a consumer within a Web Parts connection.
A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPointCollection" /> that contains all connection points in the consumer.
A Web Parts connection always involves exactly two controls, one acting as the provider of data, the other acting as the consumer of data.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件連接一定牽涉到兩個控制項，其中一個做為資料提供者，另一個做為資料的取用者。

trans-unit.source: Each control must have one or more methods that are defined as connection points.
trans-unit.target: 每個控制項都必須有一或多個定義為連接點的方法。

trans-unit.source: In the case of a consumer control, its connection points are <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> objects.
trans-unit.target: 若為取用者控制項，其連接點是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint>物件。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the consumer connection points is a necessary step in forming a Web Parts connection.
trans-unit.target: 擷取的消費者連接點是建立 Web 組件連接的必要步驟。

trans-unit.source: A consumer must always have at least one connection point to be able to establish a connection.
trans-unit.target: 取用者永遠必須至少一個連接點，若要能夠建立連接。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.GetConsumerConnectionPoints%2A> method checks a consumer control and retrieves a collection of all its connection points.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.GetConsumerConnectionPoints%2A>方法會檢查取用者控制項，並擷取其所有的連接點的集合。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control has no connection points, the method returns an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項沒有的連接點，方法會傳回空集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.GetConsumerConnectionPoints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.GetConsumerConnectionPoints%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The code example has four parts:
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例包含四個部分：

trans-unit.source: A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: A Web page that contains two custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls that can be connected, and an `<asp:webpartmanager>` element.
trans-unit.target: 包含兩個自訂的網頁<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>可連接控制項並`<asp:webpartmanager>`項目。

trans-unit.source: A source code file that contains two custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls and a custom interface.
trans-unit.target: 原始程式碼檔，其中包含兩個自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項和自訂的介面。

trans-unit.source: An explanation of how the example works in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example is the user control for changing display modes.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項變更顯示模式。
